dialog.speaker: UltimateWarrior
dialog.text: What do you want? I am busy. Anyways, as I was saying...

dialog.name: randomDialog
dialog.speaker: UltimateWarrior
dialog.text: ...then I punched the DRAGON in the sniffer... harharhar"

dialog.name: speak_to_hiro
dialog.speaker: UltimateWarrior
dialog.text: You’ve been listening to the old fool, who should go to the cuckoo house… and let him drink and enjoy the company of his new beautiful friends…

dialog.speaker: girl2
dialog.text: I'm going to marry Hiro someday!

dialog.name: end_shake
dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.text: What was that? I hope everyone is okay!
